name: Looking for Eden
description:
A post-civilization story game based in space. As you visit planets you find the story of those who lived long ago.

To control:

Movementwasd/arrow keys
Stop (flight only)
spaceInteracteMap/Log entries
tabSettingsesc

Known issues and fixes:

Getting stranded on a planet.  You can get out of your ship too far from a planet to get back in again.  Restart the game to regain access to your ship (all previously investigated locations will be remembered.)

'You are here' map marker doesn't represent where you are correctly.  The image is still accurate though, so regular map use can continue.

Skipping audio by leaving the window.  If you accidentally skip audio, or miss it for any reason it can be replayed in the log.

Can't see all the relics in the log. No fix for that one, sorry.

Location title is cut off by the top of the game frame.  Pressing the full screen button once or twice will avoid this.
